All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractExchange
A simple exchange implementation for test purposes.
Account
A pure JavaBean representation of an account.
AccountDao
Defines the methods needed to store and load accounts from a persistent storage mechanism.
AccountDaoFactory
An interface for factory that creates a Account DAO objects.
AccountException
Exception to indicate that something went wrong with an Account operation.
AccountFactory
Factory interface for the creation of accounts.
AccountManager
Interface for managing accounts.
Address
A pure JavaBean implementation of an address.
Broker
The broker interface.
BrokerException
Exception thrown when errors occur within the broker.
BrokerFactory
Factory interface for the creation of a broker.
BuyOrder
Marker interface for buy orders.
ClientOrder
A client order, represents an order request placed by a client.
ClientOrder.Type
The valid order types.
CreditCard
A pure JavaBean implementation of a credit card.
DaoFactoryException
Exception thrown when errors occur within the DaoFactory.
ExchangeEvent
Encapsulates the exchange event state.
ExchangeEvent.EventType
The exchange event types.
ExchangeListener
Interface for exchange listeners.
FauxMarket
Factory for creating a StockExchange for test purposes.

MapAccountDao
Stores the accounts in a map and persists the accounts using serialization.
MapAccountDaoFactory
 
MarketBuyOrder
Represents a market buy order.
MarketException
General Exception type for exchange errors.
MarketOrder
Marker interface for market orders.
MarketSellOrder
Represents a market sell order.
Order
Describing all the operations relevant to an order.
OrderManager
Maintains queues of different types of orders and requests the execution of orders when price conditions allow their execution.
PrivateMessageCodec
Interface for writing an encrypted byte array (ciphertext) and a signature of the plaintext data to file.
PrivateMessageTriple
Holder for ciphertext, shared key bytes and a signature of the plaintext data.
Season
 
SellOrder
Marker interface for sale orders.
SightingsUtil
 
StockExchange
An interface for stock exchanges.
StockExchangeSpi
An interface for stock exchanges that provides operations for controlling the stock exchange.
StockQuote
Represents a stock quote: a ticker symbol, a price associated with that stock and the time it was issued.
StopBuyOrder
Represents a stop buy order.
StopOrder
An extension of the abstract order adding a price property.
StopSellOrder
Represents a stop sell order.

A simple exchange implementation for test purposes.
TriggeredDispatcher<E,T>
